page.title: 07CHURCHES
page.content: Five parishes cover this area although only two of the parish churches are within the grid. 1) All Saints , Sutton Road, Porters town parish, Victorian church. 2) All Saints, Sutton and Shopland. This church seats 100,visiting congregation of 30, resident congrergation of 10. 3) St. Edmunds, never used as a church- intended as a daughter chaple for St. Lukes-now used as a community hall 4) St. Lukes,seats 350,congregation 100, has wooden frame copper roof 25 years old. 5) St. Mary's Prittlewell. The mother church for Southend. Parish covers most of the central area, west to east, excluding St. Lukes. 6) St.Melitas,Services mostly for the deaf and dumb.
